Sql.query: insert into cpa_insumo_mes ( cpainmcodi, cpainscodi, cparcodi, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainmtipinsumo, cpainmtipproceso, cpainmmes, cpainmtotal, cpainmusucreacion, cpainmfeccreacion ) values ( :cpainmcodi, :cpainscodi, :cparcodi, :emprcodi, :equicodi, :cpainmtipinsumo, :cpainmtipproceso, :cpainmmes, :cpainmtotal, :cpainmusucreacion, :cpainmfeccreacion )

update cpa_insumo_mes set cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi, cpainscodi = :cpainscodi, cparcodi = :cparcodi, emprcodi = :emprcodi, equicodi = :equicodi, cpainmtipinsumo = :cpainmtipinsumo, cpainmtipproceso = :cpainmtipproceso, cpainmmes = :cpainmmes, cpainmtotal = :cpainmtotal, cpainmusucreacion = :cpainmusucreacion, cpainmfeccreacion = :cpainmfeccreacion where cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi

select cpainmcodi, cpainscodi, cparcodi, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainmtipinsumo, cpainmtipproceso, cpainmmes, cpainmtotal, cpainmusucreacion, cpainmfeccreacion from cpa_insumo_mes order by cpainmcodi asc

select cpainmcodi, cpainscodi, cparcodi, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainmtipinsumo, cpainmtipproceso, cpainmmes, cpainmtotal, cpainmusucreacion, cpainmfeccreacion from cpa_insumo_mes where cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi

select cpainmcodi, cpainscodi, cparcodi, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainmtipinsumo, cpainmtipproceso, cpainmmes, cpainmtotal, cpainmusucreacion, cpainmfeccreacion from cpa_insumo_mes where cparcodi = :cparcodi and emprcodi = :emprcodi and equicodi = :equicodi and cpainmtipinsumo = :cpainmtipinsumo and cpainmmes = :cpainmmes
delete from cpa_insumo_mes where cparcodi = :cparcodi and equicodi = :equicodi and cpainmtipinsumo = :cpainmtipinsumo and cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi
delete from cpa_insumo_mes where cparcodi = :cparcodi and cpainmtipinsumo = :cpainmtipinsumo

update cpa_insumo_mes set cpainmtotal = (select nvl(sum(cpaindtotaldia),0) from cpa_insumo_dia where cpa_insumo_dia.cpainmcodi = cpa_insumo_mes.cpainmcodi and equicodi = :equicodi and cpaindtipinsumo = :cpaindtipinsumo and cpainddia between :cpainmfeccreacion and :cpainmfeccreacion ) where cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi
